Articles.Content:
Jebediah Kerman,A humble soul on our 7 billion kerbals on our planet,Will take on his dream,and the world's dream too. Landing and colonizing Duna at the same time.

Heres where it all began:

CHAPTER 1: Prologue

Angus Kerman: Attention Everyone! Whoever wants to take on a challenge we've been waiting for,can apply on our website: http://applicants.mars-one.com/ (Not advertising!) Jebediah went for it. He made a perfect application showing his coolness. And he somehow got accepted with bill,bob,and himself. YES! He shouted.

as he rushed downstairs and celebrated with the crys of joy! And he kept cool when he saw the duna one people come in.

Somehow...

"We are here to pick up Jeb,Bill,and Bob Kerman as Duna One Volunteers."

They said.

"Right here sir." He handed bill,jeb,and bob over.

They were excited,as they drove to the Duna One Facility.

"This,is your rocket."

Edited June 12, 2013 by BigBoy734

*GREAT HISTORY STATUS : INCOMING*

I like it. A lot. Truly. I loved it just from the 3 lines prologue.
